   0 0114 0102 05c0 1e00 5f02 0000 1512 0122 0000 08bc  (gear eco)
  19 0114 0102 05e0 1e00 5f02 0000 1512 0122 0000 089c  light on
  37 0114 0102 05c0 1e00 5f02 0000 1512 0122 0000 08bc  light off
 118 0114 0102 0ac0 1e00 5f02 0000 1512 0122 0000 08b3  gear mid
 129 0114 0102 0fc0 1e00 5f02 0000 1512 0122 0000 08b6  gear high
 139 0114 0102 00c0 1e00 5f02 0000 1512 0122 0000 08b9  gear off
 157 0114 0102 00e0 1e00 5f02 0000 1512 0122 0000 0899  light on
 171 0114 0102 00c0 1e00 5f02 0000 1512 0122 0000 08b9  light off

0x00: 00000000 gear off
0x05: 00000101 gear eco
0x0A: 00001010 gear mid
0x0F: 00001111 gear high
-> byte 4 bits 0...3

0xC0: 11000000 light off
0xE0: 11100000 light on
-> byte 5 bit 5
